trends: There have been no other sightings in Deer Park
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailswe were on break from 9:00 to 9:25. noticed a strange colored object approaching from the south, heading northewest. the first thing we noticed was the color. the orange color caught our attention. it moved slowly from south to northeast. I dont know why, but the color and shape changed, from time to time. i just thought it was a plane, but there was no strobe from the oblect, and i know planes strobe. tHE THING THAT CLINCHED IT FOR ME WAS WHEN THE OBJECT MADE AN "L" TURN LEFT, AT A GOOD SPEED. THE OBJECT SLOWED, AND THEN WENT STRAIGHT UP INTO THE CLOUDS. WE WERE SHOCKED AT THE SPEED IT WENT UP. WE NEVER SAW IT AGAIN.
Summary: Strange orange color, started as circle and changed colors.
